meanings.definition: A device consisting of a rotating chamber powered by steam used to demonstrate the conversion of heat energy into mechanical work.
meanings.sent1: The eolopile spun rapidly when the steam was released, showing how heat can make things move.
meanings.sent2: In science class, we observed the eolopile spinning as steam escaped, illustrating energy transformation.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the mischievous student added extra steam to the eolopile, causing it to spin out of control.
meanings.sent4: The eolopile, like a tiny steam engine, whirred to life with the power of heat, impressing the students.
meanings.sent5: The eolopile's spinning motion, driven by steam, left a lasting impression on the curious minds in the classroom.
